head.citation-title: Proceedings of the International Symposium on Evolving Intelligent Systems - A Symposium at the AISB 2010 Convention
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 13 papers. The topics discussed include: application of ANN-GA hybrid to run a conveyor control system; an online predictor model as adaptive linear model and evolving Takagi-Sugeno model; new developments in statistical signal processing of quaternion random variables with applications in wind forecasting; clustering to train an evolving radial basis function European conference on artificial intelligence; cascaded multiresolution spline-based fuzzy neural network; lifelong learning by evolution in robotics: bridging the gap from theory to reality; incremental classification of images by human assisted fuzzy similarity analysis; the need for benchmarks with data from stochastic processes and meta-models in evolving systems; dynamic analysis of the participatory learning algorithm; and a structure evolved learning method for Mamdani fuzzy systems.

source.sourcetitle-abbrev: Proc. Int. Symp. Evol. Intelligent Syst. - Symp. AISB Conv.
source.issuetitle: Proceedings of the International Symposium on Evolving Intelligent Systems - A Symposium at the AISB 2010 Convention
